title: Cheesy Milk Rolls

ingredients.content: 2 oz unsalted butter, plus extra to grease
5 oz all-purpose flour, plus extra to dust
1 egg white, from a large egg
7 oz mizithra cheese, cut into pieces (approx. ¾ in.)
3 ½ oz Gruyère cheese, cut into pieces (approx. ¾ in.)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 400°F. Grease and lightly flour a muffin pan.
Place flour and fennel seeds into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place eggs, egg white, milk, butter, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and warm <b>2 min/100°F/speed 5<b>.
Add fennel seed-flour mixture and baking powder and mix <b>1 min/speed 5<b>.
Add mizithra cheese and Gruyère cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>Turbo/2 sec/2-3 times<b>.
Transfer dough to prepared muffin pan, bake for 20-25 minutes (400°F) or until golden brown. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Mizithra cheese can be replaced with a firm Greek feta or other sheep's milk cheese.
Mizithra is a salty, firm Greek cheese made from goat or sheep's milk.
